title: 306.52 REPORT BY AUDITOR TO SECRETARY.
text: Immediately after the apportionment required by section 306.51 the county auditor shall report to the secretary of the cemetery the apportionment of interest due the cemetery. The auditor shall also give the secretary a statement of the total funds received by the county treasurer under sections 306.41 to 306.54 during the preceding year closing on January 1 of each year, and also a statement of the total amount of the permanent care and improvement fund belonging to that cemetery.
